message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $120.  I think you'll find it's a great deal for the value it provides.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible for us to negotiate the price down to $95?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $120 is already a very competitive price for this product. I could be persuaded to come down to $110, but that's the best I can offer.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I would like to propose a price of $100 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
